TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfoName extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密 元素的 子元素。

span.span: Represents a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `` 元素包含一个字符串标识符，该参与方验证或解密 XML 文档所使用的字符串标识符标识相应的键。The `` element contains a string identifier that the party validating or decrypting an XML document uses to identify the corresponding key. 例如，如果您收到一个已加密或签名的 XML 文档，该文档的 `` 元素值为 "AsymmetricKey1"，则将使用您和发送方命名为 "AsymmetricKey1" 的密钥来解密或验证文档。For example, if you receive an encrypted or signed XML document that has a `` element value of "AsymmetricKey1", you will use a key that you and the sender have named "AsymmetricKey1" to decrypt or verify the document. 双方必须预先同意密钥名称映射。Both parties must agree on a key name mapping ahead of time. 请注意，实际密钥不会嵌入 XML 文档中。Note that the actual key is not imbedded in the XML document. 有关 `` 元素的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 网站上提供的[XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)的4.4.1 部分或[XML 加密规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see Section 4.4.1 of the [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/) or the [XML Encryption specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/), which are available on the W3C website. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在对由通用资源标识符（URI）表示的资源进行签名时使用 对象。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例将签名保存在新文件中。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在对 XML 文档进行签名时使用 对象。The following code example uses the object when signing an XML document. 此示例将签名保存在新文件中。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在对 XML 文档进行加密时使用 对象。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将加密的密钥嵌入到加密的 XML 文档中。This example embeds an encrypted key within the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在对 XML 文档进行加密时使用 对象。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此示例将名称映射到对称密钥，以将其标识为解密方法。This example maps a name to a symmetric key to identify it to the decryption method. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

param.name: keyName
param.span: 字符串标识符，它是 元素的值。

span.span: The string identifier that is the value of the element.

summary.span: 通过指定字符串标识符来初始化 类的新实例，此字符串标识符是 元素的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying the string identifier that is the value of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `keyName` 参数可以包含任何字符串;字符串的解释特定于应用程序。The `keyName` parameter can contain any string; the interpretation of the string is specific to the application. 空格在字符串值中是有意义的。White space is significant in the string value. `keyName` 参数指定 属性的值。The `keyName` parameter specifies the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回 对象适合用作 XMLDSIG 或 XML Encryption `` 元素的子元素。The object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption `` element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以包含任何字符串;字符串的解释特定于应用程序。The property can contain any string; the interpretation of the string is specific to the application. 空格在字符串值中是有意义的。White space is significant in the string value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在对由通用资源标识符（URI）表示的资源进行签名时使用 对象。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此示例将签名保存在新文件中。This example saves the signature in a new file.
